dcterms:description: The CNN/Daily Mail dataset is a reading comprehension dataset that consists of news articles and associated questions, designed to evaluate machine comprehension capabilities.
dcterms:title: CNN/Daily Mail dataset

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar

dcterms:description: The SQuAD dataset is a large-scale reading comprehension dataset that contains over 100,000 questions based on a set of Wikipedia articles, aimed at evaluating machine understanding of text.
dcterms:title: SQuAD dataset
